descriptionHTML:
★It's an addictive Piano Music Game with tons of modes and songs! There are stunning graphics and soothing music! Don't touch on the white tiles and enjoy your time! Enjoy the piano online!

If you have a dream of becoming a professional pianist like Beethoven, Chopin or Mozart. Now you have the chance to challenge with these masters. Piano White Go! comes! It's an wonderful piano online game!

You can experience kinds of funny games which are mapped into the tiles of piano world, don't hesitate to have a try! Follow the rhythm to tap the tiles of piano, avoid to touch the white tiles.

If you are tired of those challenges, there are several other funny modes. You will find fun from this game no matter you are a music fan or just enjoy the speed of tapping tiles. It is definitely more challenging than you could imagine.

✔How to play:
- Follow rhythm to tap the black tiles and play piano music songs
- Watch out for the white tiles and never miss any piano black tiles
- Collect gold and diamonds as more as you can to unlock new songs

✔Hot Features:
- Awesome design and graphics
- High quality piano music sound tracks
- More than 90 classical songs
- More than 7 color piano tiles to select, Pink , Green, Purple, Gold etc.
- Single Player and Multiple Player mode both are available
- After you play the whole piano song, the endless mode will be unlocked
- Make your favorite songs freely and easy to access
- Hit great achievements to win tons of diamonds and gold coins
- Collection of mini games to help you relax with the music melody
- Leader-board and Google Play Game Services support

Support:
Are you having problems? Send email to support@pianowhitego.com or contact us in game by going to Settings > FAQ and Support.


Piano White Go! is a music game for ever free. You can play anytime anywhere, download it now to improve your music talent and skill. Be a music master of the piano game! Be a piano white master!

description: Every kid has his favorite toys, with which he simply loves to play and spend all his time. But over time they wear out and break. Imagine that you are a real doctor, and not simple, but one that treats toys. Introducing your kids a new game from a series of educational games for children: "Doctor for toys."If you strongly love your toys and see that they need your help. If you are always ready to take care of them, but do not know how to treat a doll, a robot or your favorite plush toys - then our new game is just for you, because it will help kids learn how to bring their toys in order in a fun game form. After a little work and trying, your child learns how to really take care of their toys, take care of them, teach them to treat them carefully.Our game in the hospital for toys is informative and fascinating. In it, each toy has its own injuries, which the kid will need to fix, conducting serious treatment. They are all soiled, they lack some parts and they urgently need your help. Do operations, sew up wounds, replace the missing parts or replace them with new ones. Do everything you can! After all, the goal of the game is simple - you need to do everything possible to mend toys. 	Become a real expert in the repair of toys. Learn to play, use your time with advantage. Play our new game, get a lot of positive emotions, and funny characters, nice music and a fascinating plot of the game will help you with this.If your baby likes games about the hospital - our game is what he needs. Download and install the application on your phone or tablet and start playing doctor for toys right now!Do not forget to visit our website at http://yovogames.comTwitter: https://twitter.com/YOVOstudioFacebook: https://facebook.com/yovogamesOK: www.ok.ru/yovo.gamesVK: https://vk.com/yovogames

description: Welcome to the new game in the genre "Climb up the mountain!" If you are a brave fellow and ready to challenge yourself, then this game is for you! Sit behind the wheel of a tractor, trucks or SUV and conquer steep slopes and impassable jungle.On your way there will be a variety of obstacles that need to be overcome, whether it be mountains of logs, wooden boxes or mud puddles! Remember that at your disposal is a winch, which will help to overcome particularly complex areas.Do not forget that every tractor, truck or SUV can be pumped to facilitate and accelerate the passage of cards. And connoisseurs of beauty can repaint the car in any color of the rainbow! Have fun all the time.If you suddenly find mistakes in the game, then boldly write about it in the reviews, we'll fix it. Have fun!
descriptionHTML:
Welcome to the new game in the genre "Climb up the mountain!"

If you are a brave fellow and ready to challenge yourself, then this game is for you! Sit behind the wheel of a tractor, trucks or SUV and conquer steep slopes and impassable jungle.

On your way there will be a variety of obstacles that need to be overcome, whether it be mountains of logs, wooden boxes or mud puddles! Remember that at your disposal is a winch, which will help to overcome particularly complex areas.

Do not forget that every tractor, truck or SUV can be pumped to facilitate and accelerate the passage of cards. And connoisseurs of beauty can repaint the car in any color of the rainbow!

Features:
🚗 Various vehicles- Tractors, off-road vehicles, trucks
🔧 The ability to improve each car
⛰️ Diverse and beautiful levels
👍 Cool 3D graphics

Climbing the mountain on an SUV is not an easy task, but very fun! Have fun all the time.

If you suddenly find mistakes in the game, then boldly write about it in the reviews, we'll fix it.

Have fun!

description: Ping Pong is one of the most practiced sports in the world. Not only in China, where it has been declared the national sport, but in all countries around the world people play Ping Pong for fun or on a competitive level. With our brand new app you will have both, a lot of fun and a nice competition while trying to beat all the other countries from around the globe on a Table Tennis World Tour.You simply choose the country you want to play for and then start your journey to become the best Ping Pong player of them all.The Ping Pong rules are exactly the same as in real life:- Each player has two serves in a row- A match ends when one player has 11 points with at least 2 points in the lead- If the score is 11:10 the match continues until one player has achieved a 2 point lead- During this overtime the players alternate after every serveYou control your bat with by swiping your finger. The fast you swipe the harder you will hit the ping pong ball. Since this control scheme feels just natural, our Ping Pong app allows you to do everything you could do in real life. Surprise your opponent with a heavy power smash or throw him off guard with a vicious undercut. Learn to use the whole table and place your shots as precisely as possible. But be aware: the further you progress in Table Tennis World Tour, the more experienced and tough your opponents will become. You’re not the only one who has mastered the art of trick shots and spinning physics.Make your way through the ranks and lead your country to the top spot of the World Championship in this 3D table tennis app.Features:- 3D Ping Pong- Table Tennis World Tour- Realistic Ping Pong Physics- One of the best sports games- Choose your own country- Become the Ping Pong Master
descriptionHTML:
Ping Pong is one of the most practiced sports in the world. Not only in China, where it has been declared the national sport, but in all countries around the world people play Ping Pong for fun or on a competitive level.
With our brand new app you will have both, a lot of fun and a nice competition while trying to beat all the other countries from around the globe on a Table Tennis World Tour.

You simply choose the country you want to play for and then start your journey to become the best Ping Pong player of them all.

The Ping Pong rules are exactly the same as in real life:
- Each player has two serves in a row
- A match ends when one player has 11 points with at least 2 points in the lead
- If the score is 11:10 the match continues until one player has achieved a 2 point lead
- During this overtime the players alternate after every serve

You control your bat with by swiping your finger. The fast you swipe the harder you will hit the ping pong ball. Since this control scheme feels just natural, our Ping Pong app allows you to do everything you could do in real life. Surprise your opponent with a heavy power smash or throw him off guard with a vicious undercut. Learn to use the whole table and place your shots as precisely as possible.

But be aware: the further you progress in Table Tennis World Tour, the more experienced and tough your opponents will become. You’re not the only one who has mastered the art of trick shots and spinning physics.

Make your way through the ranks and lead your country to the top spot of the World Championship in this 3D table tennis app.

Features:
- 3D Ping Pong
- Table Tennis World Tour
- Realistic Ping Pong Physics
- One of the best sports games
- Choose your own country
- Become the Ping Pong Master
developerAddress:
Schanzenstr. 6-20
51063 Köln
Germany
summary: Win the World Championship in this 3D Ping Pong Game with realistic physics.
title: Table Tennis World Tour - The 3D Ping Pong Game

description: It's the right time for new exciting and fun adventures! And what awaits us today is not just a walk in the park, but a real farm for children, which we will have to visit and work a little. After all, it's time to harvest.Our merry farm and all its inhabitants are looking forward to you and your kids. We present you a new exciting game from the series developing games for children - "Kids Farm".This game is a fun and addictive farm simulator. Here in the management of your baby there will be a real farm on which it will be necessary to plant vegetables, water and fertilize them, fight pests in order to subsequently harvest a good harvest. You will also need to take care of pets and a large apiary. Your kid, as a real farmer, will have to deal with all these fascinating and interesting things. Will he be able to cope with such a large farm? We will just check it!Game cheerful farm is a unique educational and developing game that will interest not only boys, but also girls. It will clearly show and help children learn: how the farm is conducted, how it is arranged, what animals are there and how to take care of them. He learns how to plant trees and other plants, take care of them, fight various agricultural pests and much more. Carrying out various interesting tasks and selling the crop to your child, with the money earned in the game, will be able to develop and decorate it, supplementing new and interesting elements in the game.        A baby farm is an exciting game that your child can play for hours on the fly, and who can entertain him when bored, and your baby will certainly want to play it again and again. Playing it, your baby will create his own, small cozy world, in which he does not have to miss a single minute, will show the crumbs all the charm and beauty of a real farm, and at the same time - without leaving home.        Do not be bored on such a wonderful day! Our farm for babies is waiting for you! To start playing the farm game you need to download it to your tablet or phone. Install the game and plunge headlong into the world of fun and joy, become the best farmer in the world!Be sure to visit our website at http://yovogames.comTwitter: https://twitter.com/YOVOstudioFacebook: https://facebook.com/yovogamesOK: www.ok.ru/yovo.gamesVK: https://vk.com/yovogames

comments: I'm incredibly thankful for this game. Finally there is a game that is enjoyable, relaxing, calming and the best way to take my mind off of the worries all around us. Words cannot fully express what this game means to me! Thanks to the developers I look forward to playing everytime. The music is wonderful! I highly recommend this game. Thanks again ♡

As much as I understand that you want to make a few bucks, the amount of advertising and the way the advertising is being presented has gradually become quite intrusive and annoying. I would much rather pay a one time license fee that this crabby implementation of user annoyance  / advertising. The other problem is that on the high end phones (read pixel 2) the board are so big that the tiles as a consequence are made very small so they fit with a final result that makes it very difficult to see/read

The ads are very annoying and I have lost interest in playing  the game anymore. I have to start over for each play. Ad won't let me continue. Someone has Really messed this game up. Just fire their butts and send them down to the river swamp. No need for them to be in the public when they can't leave well enough alone.

I think the game is great. I love Mahjong. I'm unhappy that I paid 1.99 to stop the ads but when I collect my 2,000 coin bonus I still have to watch an ad to receive the bonus. I will not be paying 1.99 next month just to still have to watch ads.
The latest update places advertising banners in the play area. You can't move them or play around them and I don't want to install the advertisement app.  They suck out loud.

Does not even lay tiles down in a solvable fashion. Had no repeats thus shud be solvable in any order, wasn't, what's the point? Sort ur algorithm out.  Also, non stop ads and u want us to pay monthly for ad free? £8 one off fee wud b highest I went for an app I'd want to keep

comments: Its awesome but why is their no idle cash when you aren't playing? I thought thats what 100 coins per min was

Loved this game!!! It is my new favorite game I love all the powerful weapons and armor. I wish there was chestplates instead of amulets and leggings instead of bracelets and an easier way to find out what your hero level, But else then that it was perfect. I loved how you can choose the controls to your own preference. Chame on anyone who gave it a less then 5 Star review. I still dont know ho to tell what your hero level was but still my favorite game.

I AM OBSESSED!!! This game is awesome, I love shooting things that deserve to be shot!!! The only problem is that you need to be a certain level to buy something and how there's only boots and helmets, and no chest plates or leggings, but when I first played it I was shocked to find 2 problems in an amazing app! 5 stars everything! Also, you should make huge, amazing looking, almost impossible bosses that will make me flip my table when I can't beat them! Keep making more awesome games!

I can't help but love a mobile game that doesn't constantly shove advertisements in your face. No silly energy system to make you wait to play, and while it has a real money store, it's tucked away in a corner where it belongs. Different control options and simple, accessible gameplay make this a hidden gem. 5 stars all the way. Kudos to the developer.

I'm really loving this game it's simple but still a ton of fun. My one complaint would be the sometimes the grind is too long and I almost gave up... I wish the developers would throw in some kind of experience boost in the store instead of just being able to buy coins. I would pay real money for an exp boost and would love to support the Developers! just give me the chance!

I understand that people want their games to be entartaining. But i dont understand why there is a thing that downgrades your item upon trying to upgrade it. I have soent the last 3 hours trying to upgrade my helm to lvl 15. Guess where it is now, On goddamn lvl 11. I have spent less time grinding mounts in wow than getting my gear to lvl 15. Stupidest thing ever. One tip. Play the campagin lvls to lvl 40. Then dont do campagin at all and run hell for gold and xp. Repeqt to lvl 80 and then get rekt by the stupid item upgrade system.

description: ColorMinis Kids is a new kind of coloring and design app for boys and girls on Android. comments: Fun and great simple no frills game. It kills my music though if I have any playing on my phone. Very annoying. Also the ad audio sometimes just plays in the background right in the middle of the game and i cant make it stop unless i close the game and reopen it.

Don't think that just because you are good at Solitare this won't be challenging. It really is, and that's part of the fun and the addiction. I like the daily challenges and don't always get them. HINT: Remember that you sometimes have to move  around the cards already up, and you have to replay at times in order to get it.
Works well. Good undo and hints. Keeps track of high scores.  Has ads, but that's OK. There's no free lunch!  Ads should NOT have audio though.
Poor coding behind the auto complete. It makes unnecessary additional moved. Emailed the company and I got a reply saying they'd pass it onto the developers. Nothing further for 3 months.
Good basic solitaire game. Ads are slightly bothersome but easily closed. Not too easy; many solitaire games let you win almost every time, but this one is more challenging.
Few adds pop up and only after you've played a game it's clear, fun, and addictive I still can't beat my old score on my old phone 38 seconds

03-23-18: HOLY SHEET THE SCI-FI UPDATE IS CRAZY AMAZING! Outerminds has done it again! I wish they made more unique celebrations (like SciFi) other than Christmas or Valentine's in the future, such as Easter or even a Video Game Mashup update. It is time to rewrite my review!  So far, it's my favorite time-waster in my device. Never utilizes the Pay2Win paywalls for the most of the time (It's one of the best non-Pay2Win apps in the era of Pay2Win), and never crashes at all! Bugs aren't frequent! There are easy ways to save Bux and Brains in the game, which gives almost every player the opportunity to customize without any problem.  The game is hugely customizable. It's like being a home designer and a Tuber at the same time. There's lots of different customization options for your room, Tuber, and stuff. I also love to switch to a certain theme during events like SciFi or Valentine's Event.  And next, the videos. You can name your videos whatever you want, and you can select a combination of genres. You could make hilarious titles like "PewDiePie Plays His Game" or "Edgar The Rapper". And then you can pretend to act them out.  One of the best parts of the game is that there are almost no annoying popup video/banner ads, unlike in most games I've played like Vlogger Go Viral. The only way to view them is to simply go for a free shipping boost by watching an ad (which does not interrupt gameplay. Watching ads is also in Quests too, and it's fine as well.)  I like the Puggle minigame as well. It doesn't make the game feel boring as it can help boost shipping time while being a playable Pachinko with Edgar and Maya.  The game's community is also very cool. No cancerous fights or something, many players of this Tuber Simulator mostly focus on hatching Pixelings, participate in room contests, and get tips on how to grind Bux! Check out the Google+ semiofficial community as well.  Probably the greatest Tuber game on the web, Outerminds. I'll send you a Sponsor Eagle filled with "Good Job" messages. Keep your game as good as possible, there's no time to lose in beating PewDiePie to his #1 spot!
Addicting. A good time waster, and quite beautiful graphics. A really good mobile game, period.
This game is fun and VERY addicting the artstyle is beautiful aswell
It's a fun game and it's very addictive game
Good, But Restrict Display Name To Something Shorter Than PewDiePie: Tuber Simulator, Like Maybe Just PewDiePie Or Tuber Sim

comments: Nice game but the random number generator is non existent. Hold three numbers and roll again, even with free or earned additional rolls, are ALWAYS the same number that was there! This would fail state regulations on gambling games. Fun but a sucker game for rolling anything that counts as statistically random

This is fun, IF you can figure it out. I like playing yahtzee but this is complicated. Every time I get extra dice, the ???? spends them or takes them away from me so I don't get to spend them the way I want to. That sucks.

Love the game! But recently did an update for the app now my game glitches out. Takes forever to roll the dice. Only updated the app cuz it said they fixed bugs & made faster well it did the opposite for my app.

Showdown is a joke!  100% guarantee opponent will get a double Yahtzee every single game.  Their average score is 320+ when a normal person scores 250-275.  Impossible enough to score a Yahtzee yourself but double is almost unheard of.

Playing verse your friends is fun but Playing against the computer is not fun but a complete waste of time. Only way to Win is to Extra rolls with the Dice you have to buy. If you don't plan on losing 2/3 of the time.
The game was awesome until the ads started to pop up every 5 seconds, and the game progressively got slower and slower. Now it's just ads upon ads and lag. Game got ruined quick.

descriptionHTML:
Roll dice & play New YAHTZEE® With Buddies! It’s a fun board game classic with a reinvented look. Play dice with friends in this new multiplayer dice game.

Challenge friends to play this family game for hours of endless fun! Yahtzee, the #1 dice game, is reimagined in the brand New YAHTZEE® With Buddies! Puzzle game fan? Then you’ll love this new multiplayer dice game! Don’t have a clue what YAHTZEE® is? Download now and you’ll soon find out!

Yatzee, yahsee, yatze, yatzy, or whatever words you choose, there’s only one Yahtzee! Give it a roll and find out why millions have played this classic family game for over 50 years!

Classic & Fun Board Game on the Go
Play the #1 dice game officially licensed by Hasbro at home or on the go.
Social game meets dice challenge: Roll dice against other players in epic gameplay.
Play dice with friends: You can even chat while you play! Now that’s a social game!

New Multiplayer Dice Game
Multiplayer challenges with Facebook friends AND current Dice with Buddies™ opponents.
Fun, even better game & epic gameplay – you’ll be rolling in no time!
Puzzle games your thing? Then you’ll love this fun board game!

Play Dice with Friends - Roll for Bonus Rolls
Win Bonus Rolls, Custom Dice, prizes and rewards! Defeat new Dice Masters daily to score.
Roll dice in epic battles that put you head to head against skilled Dice Masters!
Multiplayer matchup winners crowned in fun battles – prove you’re the best dice roller among all your friends!

Social Game: New YAHTZEE® With Buddies
Play dice and test your game skills. No need to puzzle over the rules, you’ll be playing in no time!
Bonus Rolls, Custom Dice and amazing prizes are yours to score. Roll dice with flair!
Personalize your Yahtzee experience by winning Custom Dice and vanity frames!

Whether you’re a wiz at words or a strategy enthusiast, there’s just no escaping the fun you’ll have playing New YAHTZEE® With Buddies! Want us to clue you in on why it’s so great? It’s just SO addictive!

Download New YAHTZEE® With Buddies and experience the world’s best family game and fun board game classic come to life! You’ll be lost for words!

Play this multiplayer game with friends, challenge daily Dice Masters or Dice with Buddies™ players to keep the action rolling! Experience thrilling gameplay and hours of addictive fun!

The clue is in the name: yatzy, yahtzee, yatzee, or yachty, there’s only one authentic Yahtzee!

Pick up your shaker, roll dice and prepare to shout “YAHTZEE”!

The HASBRO GAMING and YAHTZEE names and logos are trademarks of Hasbro.
© 2018 Hasbro, Pawtucket, RI 02861-1059 USA. All Rights Reserved. TM & ® denote U.S. Trademarks.

descriptionHTML:
Grow Empire: Rome is a captivating game, mixing tower defense (TD) and strategy mechanisms with role playing (RPG) elements.
You are Caesar, mighty leader of the Roman republic, your objective is to defeat other civilizations in ancient Europe with an army made-up of roman soldiers, siege weapons, heroes and barbarian mercenaries. Be ready for War!

Turn a small republic in the heart of the Italian peninsula into the greatest civilization the world has ever seen. Lead a bunch of weak peasants into the fierceness of battle to turn them into invincible warriors.
Upgrade your stronghold to defend from the most fearful barbarian's clans and armies from Italy, Gallium, Carthage and Iberian peninsula. Conquer them to expand your dominions and see your nation wealth grows.

The glory is awaiting for you Caesar!
Veni Vidi Vici!

• +1000 buildings upgrades.

comments: It's OK I love to play the game when I'm bored and it helps me to be settled back and have a good time. But these all happens when I'm offline. But when I'm connected to Wi-Fi there's too many ads just slapped into my face. Yes I understand that you'll get these ads but ketchapp seriously,will you give and ad while I'm playing the game??!! It's too much for me. But still I love the game so I just play it turning my Wi-Fi off in my mobile.

Well before I say my review, I would like to clear out a few of the negative reviews. There are not very many ads at all, in fact I barely ever even get any. Second, the controls don't suck, they are just wobbly, but that is the point. Without the difficult turning, the game would be too easy. With that all said, this game is pretty fun.

I don't know why the controls have a 3.7 rating, they're actually pretty good. The gameplay's decent and the graphics are too. Btw I get over 600 score everytime just to let you know because the controls quote on quote "barely move the car"
I know people were asking for different controls, but the new tap contols are turning the game into something so much less original.  Why don't you make the steering wheel work like in real cars?
THIS GAME IS THE WORST!!! Save yourself some time and DON'T install this thing I can barely move the car so please make easier to control. I know your trying but I,m sorry I,m uninstalling this game.
It's stupid. It's really boring after your first try! And, when you come to a turn, the car doesn't turn fast enough. When you turn before a turn, it turns too fast. This thing is hacked.

comments: Very realistic and nice game. Missions and descriptions are entertaining. Controls are also great.   Can u add more weather effects and timings like sunset, rain, snow etc. The wipers lie unused in cockpit! What abt adding lights to airplanes -nav, position lights? Some real life airline like texture could be added to make it better.        Overall, one of the best bet for airplane enthusiasts!

Well, THAT. IS. AWESOME ! I suggest to continue developing this game...that about multiplayer mode? What about if you can get money from flights , to buy new planes ? That about making new aircraft types? For example: very big planes can take more passengers to get more money but have low speeds? And other planes which are fast but with less passengers ? And best of all, why not if there is a big map which many players (about 1000 maybe) can buy airports , and transport people to different players airports? Please try and make at least some ideas into ACTION! (Not kidding, this can make the game a blast!) .......I am also sorry for people who find this hard but with some practice you can be an expert!

Great game but more issues to address.  The longer flight durations are a real waste of time,  make them more challenging rather than waiting for the destination. Also add more controls as the ones we have are not effective. How do you tell me to slow down yet i don't have the option for that?

Its quite good but a little bit of fixing will do. The part "Slow Down thing" can you please please place that where it can not block the view of the player. It is very difficult to see whats behind it so it causes us players to crash. T.Y

Why the hell they add brake when we cannot see the brake option even after landing which forces us to crash. Total stupidity do not waste time in downloading. Previously was better when there were no brakes just reverse it and stop or keep brake button always active.

Its really boring... You have to do missions you cant just fly around and do whatever you have to fly through the squares and make it to the end... And who wants stripes?! Why are they so important?! Plus its really hard to control!!
description: Flight Simulator: Fly Plane 3D is an awesome new 3D Airplane Simulator game, become the pilot and fly your commercial jet to the destination. Guide and steer your plane through all of the waypoints to ensure you head to the correct destination, go through all of the waypoints and land at your destination airport within the time limit to earn yourself more pilot stripes. When arriving at your destination zone, slow the plane down and prepare for landing, be careful not to crash! Guide your plane towards the runway and park within the marked zone to complete the level. While parking your plane, be very careful to avoid the buses, helicopters etc parked along the run way.

comments: As it is with all BitMango games, there are far too many ads. The controls are way too touchy, such a simple game should never have been executed so poorly.
I love puzzles and thinkers, this hits both. I need something to break the monotony of my 90-hour weeks and debrief at the end of my days. Loving this one for just that.

Its the perfect game for a phoneapp. Their is not much to it, so although is simple, it is also a challenge. Figuring out a challenging level is a good feeling. Absolutely love it. Their needs to be more apps like this one.

It's a fun game for challenge seekers, I  really like it, but my loonamia! Every time I complete a level,  I get rewarded with forced to sit through a 30sec.on avg. Add I don't care for, that's gotta stop or be shortened to much much less or only 10sec per, I mean myloonamia
The game in itself is fine. The problem is the constant adds, the "would you like to buy a clue", and the "are you enjoying the game?" pop-ups. A simple, relaxing game made annoying. Uninstalling.
Many block-slide apps out there. This one has relentless, loud, invasive ads continually popping up. And it's pay to win, as everything is monetized. Just a cash grab.

descriptionHTML:
Easy to play and pleasurable game for all age!

"Move the Block : Slide Puzzle" is a simple and addictive sliding block puzzle game.
Perfectly solve stages without using hints and get 3 stars and a super crown!

HOW TO PLAY
• Need to move the red block to the exit.
• Horizontal blocks can be moved from side to side
• Vertical blocks can be moved up and down

FEATURES
• Hundreds of levels
• Established a hint system helping you to solve puzzles
• Reset/Undo buttons to help you figure out each puzzle
• Smooth and delicate animation
• Great sound effects
• Try to enjoy the "Move the Block : Slide Puzzle" using various devices and screen sizes (Phones and Tablets).

NOTES
• "Move the Block : Slide Puzzle" contains the ads like banner, interstitial, video and house ads.
• "Move the Block : Slide Puzzle" is free to play, but you can purchase In-app items like AD FREE and Hints.

Candy crush is an Awesome addicting Game, Same with soda. Jelly is fun, BUT!, It is the most cheating game I have ever played. The AI will always take advantage of beating you with moves that will take what you need 98% of the time. Moves that no one can see but magically the AI knows what to choose to beat you. I love strategy games, but cheating is not a fun for anyone. The AI compition is not a compition. It's a slaghter waste of time until you get lucky or they give it too you. No strategy there. Just piss you off cheating AI. Being the top of Candy Crush and Candy crush soda. And yes also Jelly. It is ridiculous sometimes to waste my time with this one. If the AI opponents played at the highest level of what to use, then I wouldn't mind getting beaten. But when you watch the AI make the dumbest move to get what it needed, tells you that the AI sees the whole board. Even what is hidden. Give up or beat yourself up on this one. I seem to love the Gluten of punishment, lol.

description: There's a new player in town, the wiggling, jiggling Jelly Queen and she's here to challenge you to a game of Candy Crush Jelly Saga!  Whatever your favorite moves, you better hope they're Jellylicious enough to take on the mighty Jelly Queen. The unstoppably spreadable game!  New Candy Crush Jelly Saga is full of delightful new game modes, features and boss battles featuring the Jelly Queen!  Playing as Jenny, show off your Jellylicious moves and take turns switching Candies against the jiggling Jelly Queen. Every sweet move will spread more Jelly and whoever spreads the most will win the level! Have you got the moves? There are splendid new Candies, a marvelous new booster and a dreamy treetop world to explore in the Candy Kingdom too! Take on this delightful Saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score!Candy Crush Jelly Saga is completely free to play but in-game currency, to buy items such as extra moves or lives, will require payment with real money.By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service; http://about.king.com/consumer-terms/termsCandy Crush Jelly Saga features:• Over 700 Jellylicious Levels       • New  Boss Modes       • Marvelous game modes including: Spread the Jelly & Release the Pufflers      • Tasty new Color Bomb Lollipop booster    • Mesmerizing new Candies      • Dreamy new treetop world and a host of quirky characters led by the Jelly Queen and her stooges.• Easy and fun to play, yet challenging to fully master      • For players that Facebook Connect, there are leaderboards for you and your friends to compare your Jellylicious scores• Easily sync the game between mobile and tablet devices and unlock the full game features when connected to the internetAlready a fan of Candy Crush Jelly Saga? Like us on Facebook or follow us on Twitter for the latest news:https://www.facebook.com/CandyCrushJellySaga/https://twitter.com/candycrushjellyLast but not least, a big THANK YOU goes out to everyone who has played Candy Crush Jelly Saga!
descriptionHTML:
There's a new player in town, the wiggling, jiggling Jelly Queen and she's here to challenge you to a game of Candy Crush Jelly Saga! Whatever your favorite moves, you better hope they're Jellylicious enough to take on the mighty Jelly Queen.

Playing as Jenny, show off your Jellylicious moves and take turns switching Candies against the jiggling Jelly Queen. descriptionHTML:
Celebrate Spring with our limited-time Spring updates

Build your own world in this strategy war game! War and Order is the perfect fusion of real time strategy, tower defense, and castle building games and has received several Global Google Recommendations.

Orcs, elves, and mages are yours to command in a gorgeous 3D medieval game world. Raise a massive fantasy army for HUGE fully animated battles. Clash with enemies from all over the world in real-time! Choose your alliance and take castles, slay monsters, and stake new territory as a tribe! This is WAR, and there’s never a dull moment as your screen lights up with constant new battles, chats, and upgrades!

You must battle to become more powerful than any king in history in this dangerous war game. It’s up to you, your strategy, and your allies to conquer an endless world of empires and imagination.

★HOMELAND
• Recruit and train over 50 fantasy soldiers, uniting Orcs, Elves, Humans, Mages, Beasts, and Angels.
• Your ultimate building game: Construct and upgrade tons of buildings for new soldiers, buffs, and resources!
• Research new magic and technology FAST for cutting-edge tactics and weapons!

★ALLIANCE
• Friend, feud, and chat with players from around the world in real time.
• Fight and build together to conquer enemies and build castles you could never hold alone.
• Share and expand territory for exclusive bonuses!
• But remember! This is a war strategy game. Tust no one!

★CONFRONTATION
• Sweep the battlefield in huge real-time PvP matches!
• Build your force to leviathan proportions!
• Engulf other lords’ castles as you expand your territory.

★CONQUEST
• Command and conquer other players’ castles to plunder their resources and climb power rankings!
• Vanquish roaming monsters for their treasures, from man-eating Ogres to massive Dragons.
• Play castle defense games and protect yourself and your allies from would-be conquerors.

★EMPIRE
• Not just a one castle game: Take over the Royal City to rule over the realm with unheard of power and privileges!
• Explore unknown lands to find elite resources, ancient ruins, and more surprises!
• Grow your alliance territory for richer rewards and resources!

Follow War and Order on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/WarandOrder1/

comments: This game used to be Boss. Now it is updated and lame.  New rules about only being able to play with people within ten levels of your own.  Give me a break.  Let me play with who I want.  I can't even play with guys on my own squad now.  I used to love this game but until they fix this issue this game is weak.

This game is dumb takes a hour and half to download after the download from the play store.. Then when asked to put ur name in u can only use latin characters and numbers whatever that is. This game needs work don't download.

New update gives the larger maps a hazy foggy look and you cant see into the distance.  Zombies is fun, can't get too far as they seem too strong. Aliens is cool. Would like to see a different method for switching guns. If i swipe on android i accidently swipe and my notification bar comes down instead. Need some better  algorithms for matches. It's tough to get into a match with some super over powered weapons...or are they modding? Would like to see an in game reporting/tagging system for obvious hackers.  There are several who frequently hack and don't get booted from the game permanently.

Once again a mobile game that doesn't get it ! Besides the gplay store download there's another almost gig download  my question is how am I supposed to straffe one finger aim with another hold device And then hit a shoot buttons without stopping to become a sitting duck ?or not aiming maybe this was made for an octopus? .

There has been some troubles with the new update The app logo is of an Android and the maps is not complete some areas doesn't load unless we visit there finding it hard when playing as a sniper please fix it  Thank you
The game maps are so low quality AND don't Produce Visuals at long Ranges On My OnePlus 5T after this last Update (can't even see the players at Normal Distance)
description: You ready for the gun show? Because Blitz Brigade is packing major heat in this over-the-top (and over budget) online FPS war fest!Put on your game face as one of seven highly skilled and totally badass classes and team up with other players to blast your enemies into the ground… Then dig 'em up so you can blast 'em again! Enter an outlandish alternate history where the world’s military leaders are actually sensible people, and the warring forces of the Axis and Allies realize that a world war would literally be the worst thing ever. So, they decide that it would be a lot less messy (and a ton more fun) if we just picked the greatest, most trigger-happy shooters and troopers from both sides to fight it out in amazing team arenas full of guns, bombs, tanks, and other crazy tools that makes things go BOOM!So why not gear up, join the fight, and feel the rush of MMO FPS combat!*****LOCK 'N' LOAD FOR MULTIPLAYER FPS MAYHEM!*****GIVE AN ONLINE BEATDOWN!√ Up to 12 players can battle at the same time online for completely frantic combat games and maximum fun.√ Catch limited-time events for new challenges, seasonal contests and loads of fun new content, including specially themed weapons and costumes!√ Create or join a Squad to crush global opponents in MMO team games and work together towards gaining glory and rewards.√ Voice Chat lets you plan your FPS strategy and call out to allies in the heat of battle.PICK A CLASS FOR KICKING... BUTT√ 7 Classes: Jump into combat as the versatile Soldier, the heavy-hitting Gunner, the supportive Medic, the precise Sniper, the cunning Stealth, the fearsome Demolisher or the tactical Engineer.√ Customize and master each class's specialized skills to do your best in team games and counter your opponent's plan.√ Unlock each class's Ultra Abilities, which can completely shift the tide of battle. Imagine being a Sniper that can see through walls, or a Stealth that can't be seen at all!√ Unique taunts and kill quotes add character to your team. Because a good taunt can do more damage than almost any weapon…√ Top off your unique look with a wide selection of hats.LOADS OF MODES√ Deathmatch: Race to rack up the most kills for your team in a straightforward firefight.√ Domination: Strike key positions and take control of the battlefield while defending your positions. The ultimate test of teamwork!√ Capture the Flag: Infiltrate the enemy stronghold, swipe the flag and (here’s the tricky part) get it BACK to your base before getting blown to pieces!√ Free-for-All: Take down the first moving thing you see... and the second... and pretty much everything after that! In this mad shooter mode, it's every person for themselves!PACK SOME POWER √ Roll out in a variety of armed and explosive land and air assault vehicles.√ Pilot the Crusher—a mech made to step all over the competition!√ Gear up with over 100 wild weapons to customise your chaos.√ Prime your skills in challenging single-player missions that will train you for the multiplayer PvP games.*****War Is a Hell of a Good Time!*****For fans of free online action games, class-based multiplayer shooters, first-person shooters, army/war games, or anyone who enjoys a good MMO fight.Enter the battlefield, get ready for the war, and enjoy hours of FPS fun!______Visit our official site at http://gmlft.co/website_ENCheck out the new blog at http://gmlft.co/centralDon't forget to follow us on social media:Facebook: http://gmlft.co/BB_FacebookTwitter: http://gmlft.co/SNS_TW_ENInstagram: http://gmlft.co/BB_InstagramYouTube: http://gmlft.co/BB_YouTubeForum: http://gmlft.co/BB_ForumThis app allows you to purchase virtual items within the app and may contain third-party advertisements that may redirect you to a third-party site.Terms of Use: http://www.gameloft.com/en/conditions-of-usePrivacy Policy: http://www.gameloft.com/en/privacy-noticeEnd-User License Agreement: http://www.gameloft.com/en/eula
descriptionHTML:
You ready for the gun show? Because Blitz Brigade is packing major heat in this over-the-top (and over budget) online FPS war fest!

Put on your game face as one of seven highly skilled and totally badass classes and team up with other players to blast your enemies into the ground… Then dig 'em up so you can blast 'em again!

Enter an outlandish alternate history where the world’s military leaders are actually sensible people, and the warring forces of the Axis and Allies realize that a world war would literally be the worst thing ever. So, they decide that it would be a lot less messy (and a ton more fun) if we just picked the greatest, most trigger-happy shooters and troopers from both sides to fight it out in amazing team arenas full of guns, bombs, tanks, and other crazy tools that makes things go BOOM!

So why not gear up, join the fight, and feel the rush of MMO FPS combat!

*****LOCK 'N' LOAD FOR MULTIPLAYER FPS MAYHEM!*****

GIVE AN ONLINE BEATDOWN!
√ Up to 12 players can battle at the same time online for completely frantic combat games and maximum fun.
√ Catch limited-time events for new challenges, seasonal contests and loads of fun new content, including specially themed weapons and costumes!
√ Create or join a Squad to crush global opponents in MMO team games and work together towards gaining glory and rewards.
√ Voice Chat lets you plan your FPS strategy and call out to allies in the heat of battle.

PICK A CLASS FOR KICKING... BUTT
√ 7 Classes: Jump into combat as the versatile Soldier, the heavy-hitting Gunner, the supportive Medic, the precise Sniper, the cunning Stealth, the fearsome Demolisher or the tactical Engineer.
√ Customize and master each class's specialized skills to do your best in team games and counter your opponent's plan.
√ Unlock each class's Ultra Abilities, which can completely shift the tide of battle. Imagine being a Sniper that can see through walls, or a Stealth that can't be seen at all!
√ Unique taunts and kill quotes add character to your team. Because a good taunt can do more damage than almost any weapon…
√ Top off your unique look with a wide selection of hats.

LOADS OF MODES
√ Deathmatch: Race to rack up the most kills for your team in a straightforward firefight.
√ Domination: Strike key positions and take control of the battlefield while defending your positions. The ultimate test of teamwork!
√ Capture the Flag: Infiltrate the enemy stronghold, swipe the flag and (here’s the tricky part) get it BACK to your base before getting blown to pieces!
√ Free-for-All: Take down the first moving thing you see... and the second... and pretty much everything after that! In this mad shooter mode, it's every person for themselves!

PACK SOME POWER
√ Roll out in a variety of armed and explosive land and air assault vehicles.
√ Pilot the Crusher—a mech made to step all over the competition!
√ Gear up with over 100 wild weapons to customise your chaos.
√ Prime your skills in challenging single-player missions that will train you for the multiplayer PvP games.

*****War Is a Hell of a Good Time!*****
For fans of free online action games, class-based multiplayer shooters, first-person shooters, army/war games, or anyone who enjoys a good MMO fight.
Enter the battlefield, get ready for the war, and enjoy hours of FPS fun!
______

Visit our official site at http://gmlft.co/website_EN
Check out the new blog at http://gmlft.co/central

Don't forget to follow us on social media:
Facebook: http://gmlft.co/BB_Facebook
Twitter: http://gmlft.co/SNS_TW_EN
Instagram: http://gmlft.co/BB_Instagram
YouTube: http://gmlft.co/BB_YouTube
Forum: http://gmlft.co/BB_Forum

title: Blitz Brigade - Online FPS fun
